ygData.subject: Re: are there any master fletcher's on this board
ygData.msgSnippet: I am a Master but just barely.  I thankfully got my skill to 102 JUST before the patch that made it prohibative to keep raising my skill.  I pretty much only
ygData.messageBody:
I am a Master but just barely. I thankfully got my skill to 102 JUST
before the patch that made it prohibative to keep raising my skill. I
pretty much only make bows now, on demand - money up front as being a
Bard I can't even use the practice arrows I make, but either have to
sell them for a lose to vendors or give them to friends to use when we
fight.

Samiba Craftsman

--- Vytautas Dwarf/Paladin <vytautasthedwarf@...> wrote:
> From: Vytautas Dwarf/Paladin
> <vytautasthedwarf@...>
>
>
> I also belong to an EQ brewing and Tailoring board,
> however, those boards
> are actually active. I get at least 10 msgs a day
> on each of the other
> boards from people answering questions and sharing
> expertise. I have been
> on this board for a week and have only received 2
> msgs (which it seems I am
> the only one who answered them) and have received no
> replies regarding my
> own post a few days ago about fletching past 160.
> Are there any Master
> fletcher on this board and why is everyone so quiet?
>
